Package gameobjects.ui

Class Shop

java.lang.Object
gameobjects.ui.Shop
public class Shop extends Object
The object for defining the shop within the game. Holds all of the purchaseable towers, upgrades, and miscellaneous buttons. Most buttons in the shop are anonymous classes to reduce complexity.
See Also:
Button
